info.title: Children's Drawing Anomaly Detection System
info.description: Machine learning system for detecting anomalies in children's drawings

post.description:
Upload drawing with metadata.

This endpoint accepts multipart form data with an image file and metadata.
The image is validated, preprocessed, and stored along with the metadata.

get.description: Get upload progress for large file uploads.
Retrieve drawing details by ID.
Retrieve the actual drawing file.
List drawings with optional filtering and pagination.

post.description:
Upload multiple drawings in batch.

This endpoint accepts multiple files and processes them in the background.
Returns an upload ID for tracking progress.

get.description: Get statistics about stored drawings.

Get dashboard statistics for analyses and drawings.

This endpoint provides comprehensive statistics for the dashboard
including drawing counts, analysis results, and model status.

post.description:
Analyze specific drawing for anomalies.

This endpoint performs anomaly detection on a single drawing,
generating embeddings, computing anomaly scores, and providing
interpretability results if the drawing is flagged as anomalous.

Batch analyze multiple drawings.

This endpoint accepts a list of drawing IDs and processes them
in the background, returning a batch ID for progress tracking.

schema.title: Response Batch Analyze Api V1 Analysis Batch Post

get.description: Get progress of batch analysis.

Get analysis results by analysis ID.

This endpoint retrieves a complete analysis result including
the drawing information, anomaly analysis, and interpretability
results if available.

post.description:
Generate embedding for a drawing without requiring a trained model.

This endpoint is used during the training phase to generate embeddings
for all drawings before training the autoencoder models.

get.description:
Get all analyses for a specific drawing.

This endpoint returns the analysis history for a drawing,
ordered by most recent first.

Get interactive saliency data with hoverable regions and click explanations.

This endpoint provides enhanced interpretability data that supports
interactive user interfaces with hover explanations and click-to-zoom functionality.

Get simplified, non-technical explanations suitable for educators and parents.

This endpoint provides explanations adapted for different user roles
with accessible language and clear recommendations.

Get confidence metrics and reliability scores for interpretability results.

This endpoint provides detailed confidence information to help users
assess the trustworthiness of the analysis and interpretations.

post.description:
Export interpretability results in multiple formats (PDF, PNG, CSV, JSON, HTML).

This endpoint allows users to export comprehensive interpretability reports
with customizable options for different use cases.

get.description:
Get example interpretation patterns for educational purposes.

This endpoint provides a gallery of common interpretation patterns
with explanations suitable for different user roles.

schema.title: Response Get Example Patterns Api V1 Interpretability Examples Get

get.description:
Get comparison examples for educational purposes from a specific age group.

This endpoint provides examples of normal and anomalous drawings
to help users understand typical patterns and variations. Now supports
filtering by subject category for more targeted comparisons.

Get detailed anomaly attribution breakdown (age vs subject vs visual).

This endpoint provides detailed information about what contributed
to the anomaly detection: age-related factors, subject-specific factors,
or visual characteristics.

post.description:
Add user annotations to interpretability results.

This endpoint allows users to add their own notes and observations
to interpretability results for future reference.

get.description:
List available age group models.

This endpoint returns all age group models with their status,
sample counts, and threshold information.

post.description:
Train new age group model.

This endpoint starts training a new autoencoder model for the specified
age range. Training is performed in the background and progress can be
tracked using the returned job ID.

get.description: Get training job status.

put.description:
Update model threshold.

This endpoint allows updating the anomaly detection threshold
for a specific age group model. The threshold can be set directly
or calculated from a percentile of validation data.

schema.title: Response Update Model Threshold Api V1 Models  Model Id  Threshold Put

get.description:
Get model training and system status.

This endpoint provides an overview of the model management system,
including counts of models in different states and overall system health.

post.description:
Automatically create age group models based on data distribution.

This endpoint analyzes the available drawing data and creates
appropriate age group models with sufficient sample sizes.

get.description: Get model creation job status.

delete.description:
Delete (deactivate) an age group model.

This endpoint deactivates a model rather than permanently deleting it
to preserve analysis history.

get.description:
Analyze data sufficiency for age groups.

This endpoint analyzes the available data for specified age groups
and provides warnings about insufficient data, unbalanced distributions,
and other data quality issues.

Args:
    age_groups: Comma-separated list of age ranges (e.g., "3-4,4-5,5-6")
               If not provided, analyzes all existing age group models

Analyze data sufficiency for a specific age group.

This endpoint provides detailed analysis of data availability,
quality, and distribution for a single age group.

post.description:
Merge age groups to improve data sufficiency.

This endpoint deactivates the original age group models and creates
a new merged age group model with combined data.

get.description:
Get data sufficiency warnings for all age groups.

This endpoint returns warnings about data quality issues,
optionally filtered by severity level.

post.description:
Submit a new training job to either local or SageMaker environment.

This endpoint creates and submits a training job based on the specified
environment. For SageMaker jobs, it handles container building, data upload,
and job submission. For local jobs, it starts training immediately.

get.description:
List training jobs with optional filtering.

This endpoint returns a list of training jobs, optionally filtered
by environment (local/sagemaker) and status.

schema.title: Response List Training Jobs Api V1 Training Jobs Get

get.description:
Get detailed status of a specific training job.

This endpoint returns comprehensive information about a training job,
including progress, metrics, and environment-specific details.

schema.title: Response Get Training Job Status Api V1 Training Jobs  Job Id  Get

post.description:
Cancel a running training job.

This endpoint attempts to cancel a training job. For local jobs,
it stops the training process. For SageMaker jobs, it stops the
SageMaker training job.

get.description:
Get training reports for a specific job.

This endpoint returns all training reports associated with a job,
including metrics, model paths, and performance summaries.

schema.title: Response Get Training Reports Api V1 Training Jobs  Job Id  Reports Get

post.description:
Deploy trained model parameters to production system.

This endpoint loads trained model parameters and creates a new
age group model for production use.

get.description:
Get status of available training environments.

This endpoint returns information about local and SageMaker
training environments, including availability and configuration.

post.description:
Setup SageMaker training environment.

This endpoint helps set up the necessary AWS resources for
SageMaker training, including IAM roles and container repositories.

Export trained model from training job in production-compatible format.

This endpoint exports a trained model from a completed training job,
creating a production-ready model file with metadata and validation.

get.description:
List all exported models with their metadata.

This endpoint returns a list of all models that have been exported,
including their metadata, export timestamps, and file information.

post.description:
Validate exported model for compatibility and integrity.

This endpoint performs comprehensive validation of an exported model,
checking file integrity, compatibility, and performance metrics.

Deploy exported model to production environment.

This endpoint deploys an exported model to the production system,
making it available for anomaly detection in the specified age group.

get.description:
List all deployed models in production.

This endpoint returns information about all models currently
deployed and active in the production system.

post.description:
Undeploy (deactivate) a deployed model.

This endpoint deactivates a deployed model, removing it from
active use in the production system.

get.description:
Get current system configuration.

This endpoint returns the current system configuration including
model settings, threshold parameters, and age grouping strategy.

put.description:
Update system configuration.

This endpoint updates various system configuration settings
including thresholds and age grouping parameters.

Update global threshold settings.

This endpoint recalculates thresholds for all active models
using the specified percentile value from the request body.

Modify age grouping strategy.

This endpoint updates the age grouping configuration and can
optionally trigger recreation of age group models.

get.description:
System health check endpoint.

This endpoint provides information about the health and status
of various system components.

Get comprehensive system statistics.

This endpoint provides detailed statistics about the system
including data distribution, model performance, and usage metrics.

Get list of supported subject categories.

This endpoint returns all supported subject categories that can be used
when uploading drawings, along with usage statistics.

Get subject-specific statistics and analysis data.

This endpoint provides detailed statistics about drawings and analyses
for specific subject categories or overall subject-related metrics.

Get status of subject-aware model capabilities.

This endpoint provides information about the current subject-aware
modeling capabilities and model status.

post.description:
Reset system configuration and models.

WARNING: This endpoint deactivates all models and clears caches.
Use with caution in production environments.

get.description:
Get current documentation generation status.

Returns real-time status of documentation generation including progress,
current task, and any errors or warnings.

Get comprehensive documentation metrics.

Returns metrics about documentation files, generation history,
success rates, and validation status.

post.description:
Trigger documentation generation.

Starts documentation generation process in the background.
Use the status endpoint to monitor progress.

Generate documentation synchronously.

Runs documentation generation and waits for completion.
Use this for smaller generation tasks or when immediate results are needed.

get.description:
Get available documentation categories.

Returns list of available documentation categories that can be generated.

Get list of documentation files with metadata.

Returns comprehensive list of documentation files with metadata,
filtering, and search capabilities.

parameters.name: search

schema.description: Search in file names and content
schema.title: Search

parameters.description: Search in file names and content

delete.description:
Clear documentation generation cache.

Forces regeneration of all documentation by clearing the cache.

get.description:
Get comprehensive validation status for all documentation.

Returns detailed validation results including errors, warnings,
and quality metrics.

post.description:
Run validation on documentation.

Validates documentation for technical accuracy, link integrity,
accessibility compliance, and formatting consistency.

get.description:
Preview documentation changes before generation.

Shows what would be generated for a specific category or file
without actually writing the files.

post.description:
Batch generate multiple documentation categories with scheduling.

Allows generating multiple categories in sequence with different
configurations for each category.

Batch validate multiple documentation categories.

Runs validation on multiple categories in parallel for faster processing.

get.description:
Get current generation schedule and queue.

Returns information about scheduled and queued generation tasks.

post.description:
Schedule documentation generation for later execution.

Allows scheduling generation tasks for specific times or intervals.

Search documentation with advanced filtering and faceting.

Provides full-text search across all documentation with relevance scoring,
faceted filtering, and intelligent suggestions.

get.description:
Get search suggestions for autocomplete.

Provides intelligent search suggestions based on indexed content
and common search patterns.

Get search index statistics.

Returns comprehensive statistics about the search index including
document counts, index size, and performance metrics.

post.description:
Rebuild the search index.

Rebuilds the search index from all documentation files.
Use force=true to completely rebuild the index.

get.description:
Get navigation context for a document.

Returns comprehensive navigation context including breadcrumbs,
cross-references, related content, and sequential navigation.

Get complete documentation sitemap.

Returns hierarchical sitemap of all documentation organized by type
and category with metadata.

Get cross-reference analysis report.

Returns comprehensive analysis of cross-references including
broken links, most referenced documents, and orphaned content.

post.description:
Rebuild navigation structure.

Rebuilds the navigation structure and cross-reference index
from all documentation files.

get.description: Basic health check endpoint.
Detailed health check with all system components.
Get health status for a specific component.
Get current system metrics.
Get historical system metrics.
Get current system alerts.

post.description: Update system alert thresholds.

get.description: Get overall system status summary.

post.description: Create a full system backup including database and files.

parameters.name: include_files

schema.description: Include uploaded files and generated content
schema.title: Include Files

parameters.description: Include uploaded files and generated content

post.description: Create a database-only backup.

get.description: Get list of available backup files.
Download a specific backup file.

post.description: Restore system from a backup file.
Upload a backup file for restoration.
Export system data in specified format.

get.description: Download an exported data file.

post.description: Clean up old backup files based on retention policy.

get.description: Get information about storage usage and organization.

post.summary: Clean up temporary and orphaned files
post.description: Clean up temporary files and orphaned data.

get.description: Root endpoint providing basic system information.
Health check endpoint for monitoring.
Detailed health check with system information.
Get system metrics for monitoring.

AgeGroupModelResponse.description: Response model for age group model information.

AnalysisHistoryResponse.description: Response model for analysis history of a drawing.

drawing_id.description: ID of the drawing to analyze

force_reanalysis.description: Force re-analysis even if results exist

AnalysisRequest.description: Request model for analyzing a drawing.

comparison_examples.title: Comparison Examples
comparison_examples.description: Similar normal examples from the same age group

AnalysisResultResponse.title: AnalysisResultResponse
AnalysisResultResponse.description: Complete analysis result including drawing, analysis, and interpretability.

region_id.title: Region Id
region_id.description: ID of the region being annotated

AnnotationRequest.title: AnnotationRequest
AnnotationRequest.description: Request model for adding annotations to interpretability results.

anomaly_score.title: Anomaly Score
anomaly_score.description: Overall reconstruction loss on full 832-dimensional embedding

normalized_score.title: Normalized Score
normalized_score.description: Normalized anomaly score (0-100 scale: 0=no anomaly, 100=maximal anomaly)

is_anomaly.title: Is Anomaly
is_anomaly.description: Whether the drawing is flagged as anomalous

AnomalyAnalysisResponse.title: AnomalyAnalysisResponse
AnomalyAnalysisResponse.description: Response model for anomaly analysis results.

AttentionPatchResponse.description: Response model for Vision Transformer attention patches.

drawing_ids.title: Drawing Ids
drawing_ids.description: List of drawing IDs to analyze

force_reanalysis.title: Force Reanalysis
force_reanalysis.description: Force re-analysis even if results exist

BatchAnalysisRequest.title: BatchAnalysisRequest
BatchAnalysisRequest.description: Request model for batch analysis of multiple drawings.

total_drawings.title: Total Drawings
total_drawings.description: Total number of drawings to analyze

BatchAnalysisResponse.title: BatchAnalysisResponse
BatchAnalysisResponse.description: Response model for batch analysis operations.

similarity_score.title: Similarity Score
similarity_score.description: Similarity score to the analyzed drawing

anomaly_score.title: Anomaly Score
anomaly_score.description: Anomaly score of the comparison example

normalized_score.title: Normalized Score
normalized_score.description: Normalized anomaly score of the comparison example (0-100 scale: 0=no anomaly, 100=maximal anomaly)

normal_examples.title: Normal Examples
normal_examples.description: Normal drawings from same age group

total_available.title: Total Available
total_available.description: Total examples available in this age group

ComparisonExamplesResponse.title: ComparisonExamplesResponse
ComparisonExamplesResponse.description: Response model for comparison examples from the same age group.

ConfidenceMetricsResponse.title: ConfidenceMetricsResponse
ConfidenceMetricsResponse.description: Response model for confidence metrics and reliability scores.

ConfigurationUpdateRequest.title: ConfigurationUpdateRequest
ConfigurationUpdateRequest.description: Request model for updating system configuration.

is_generating.title: Is Generating
is_generating.description: Whether documentation is currently being generated

DrawingListResponse.title: DrawingListResponse
DrawingListResponse.description: Response model for listing multiple drawings.

ExpertLabel.title: ExpertLabel
ExpertLabel.description: Enumeration for expert labels on drawings.

format.title: Format
format.description: Export format: pdf, png, csv, json, html

ExportRequest.title: ExportRequest
ExportRequest.description: Request model for exporting interpretability results.

file_url.title: File Url
file_url.description: URL to download the exported file

force.title: Force
force.description: Force regeneration even if no changes detected

InteractiveInterpretabilityResponse.title: InteractiveInterpretabilityResponse
InteractiveInterpretabilityResponse.description: Response model for interactive interpretability data.

bounding_box.title: Bounding Box
bounding_box.description: Bounding box coordinates [x1, y1, x2, y2]

InteractiveRegionResponse.title: InteractiveRegionResponse
InteractiveRegionResponse.description: Response model for interactive saliency regions.

importance_regions.title: Importance Regions
importance_regions.description: List of important regions with bounding boxes

replace_existing.title: Replace Existing
replace_existing.description: Whether to replace existing model for age group

ModelDeploymentRequest.title: ModelDeploymentRequest
ModelDeploymentRequest.description: Request model for deploying trained model parameters.

ModelListResponse.title: ModelListResponse
ModelListResponse.description: Response model for listing age group models.

ModelStatusResponse.title: ModelStatusResponse
ModelStatusResponse.description: Response model for model training and system status.

ModelTrainingRequest.title: ModelTrainingRequest
ModelTrainingRequest.description: Request model for training a new age group model.

visual_indicators.title: Visual Indicators
visual_indicators.description: Simple visual cues and their meanings

age_appropriate_context.title: Age Appropriate Context
age_appropriate_context.description: Context appropriate for the age group

SimplifiedExplanationResponse.title: SimplifiedExplanationResponse
SimplifiedExplanationResponse.description: Response model for simplified, non-technical explanations.

ThresholdUpdateRequest.title: ThresholdUpdateRequest
ThresholdUpdateRequest.description: Request model for updating model thresholds.

job_name.title: Job Name
job_name.description: Unique name for the training job

TrainingConfigRequest.title: TrainingConfigRequest
TrainingConfigRequest.description: Request model for training job configuration.

TrainingJobResponse.title: TrainingJobResponse
TrainingJobResponse.description: Response model for training job information.

TrainingReportResponse.title: TrainingReportResponse
TrainingReportResponse.description: Response model for training report information.
